text: The Obie Awards or Off-Broadway Theater Awards are annual awards originally given by Village Voice newspaper to theatre artists and groups in New York City ==Ceremony history== Obie Award ceremonies have been held at Webster Hall in Manhattan's East Village since the 2010-2011 season.
